faq.question: How do I view announcements?
faq.answer: To view announcements, click on the 'Announcements' menu item in the sidebar. You'll see all recent barangay announcements with details like dates, descriptions, and images.

faq.question: How do I submit feedback?
faq.answer: Go to the 'Feedback & Concerns' page from the sidebar. Click 'Submit New Feedback' button, fill out the form with your category, message, and optional attachment, then submit.

faq.question: How do I vote in surveys?
faq.answer: Navigate to 'Vote & Surveys' from the sidebar. You'll see available surveys and voting options. Click on a survey to view details and cast your vote.

faq.question: What are emergency alerts?
faq.answer: Emergency alerts are urgent notifications about safety, weather, health advisories, or other critical information. View them in the 'Emergency Alerts' section.

faq.question: How do I check my verification status?
faq.answer: Your verification status is shown on your Profile page. If pending, you'll see a 'Pending Verification' page. Once verified, you can access all features.

faq.question: How do I contact barangay officials?
faq.answer: Visit the 'Officials' page to see contact information for all barangay officials including phone numbers and email addresses.

services.name: Barangay Clearance
services.description: A document certifying residency. Required for various transactions.
services.process: Submit requirements at barangay hall, pay fees, wait for processing (usually 1-2 days)

services.name: Business Permit
services.description: Required for operating a business within the barangay.
services.process: Apply at barangay hall, inspection scheduled, approval and payment

services.name: Certificate of Indigency
services.description: Certifies financial status for government assistance programs.
services.process: Submit documents, verification process, issuance of certificate

navigation.dashboard: The Dashboard is your home page showing recent announcements and quick access to main features.
navigation.announcements: Announcements page displays all barangay announcements. Use the sidebar menu to navigate there.
navigation.officials: Officials page shows contact information for barangay officials. Access via sidebar menu.
navigation.emergency-alerts: Emergency Alerts shows urgent safety and health notifications. Found in the sidebar.
navigation.vote: Vote & Surveys allows you to participate in barangay surveys and voting. Access from sidebar.
navigation.feedback: Feedback & Concerns lets you submit feedback, complaints, or suggestions. Available in sidebar.
navigation.profile: Profile page shows your account information and verification status. Click profile icon in sidebar footer.

announcements.title: Managing Announcements
steps: Navigate to 'Manage Announcements' from admin sidebar
Fill in title, description, date, and optional image
Click 'Publish' to make it visible to residents

emergency_alerts.title: Creating Emergency Alerts
steps: Enter title, description, and effective dates
Publish to notify all residents immediately
tips: Use High severity for critical alerts

officials.title: Managing Officials
steps: Click 'Add Official' to add new official
Enter name, position, contact number, and email
Save to update the officials directory

feedback.title: Reviewing Feedback
steps: Click on a submission to view details
Reply to residents using the reply form

steps: Create new survey with questions and options
